name: Diver Dash (itch)
description:
A simple 2d platformer.

WASD, Arrow Keys, HJKL (for the vim lovers), or Gamepad Left joystick to move

Space, Left mouse click, or XBOX A button to jump

Simply get to the bue portal, and watch out for spikes!

Oh yeah, and its multiplayer, you might see some friends playing with you. :)
